course.subject: ECON
course.name: ECON UG Honors Thesis II
course.description: This course is a supervised course which trains student to do proper economic research. This course is Part II of the ECON UG Honors Thesis that consists of two parts (ECON3800: Honors Thesis I and ECON4800: Honors Thesis II). This course is designed to help students to produce a tangible research output in the form of a written thesis. An individual faculty supervisor will be assigned to each student. The research output will be disseminated via the end-of-the-semester UG research workshop where all students taking this course are invited to present their work.
